venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
A FREE Class:  Meditation Can Be Easy!

 

Saturday Evening, April 9th, 7:00 –9:00pm, at Roots and Wings

 

Are you aware of the benefits of meditating, but can’t get yourself to do it or you think it’s too difficult?


Meditation can be one of the easiest and most effective means to living with greater harmony, happiness and well-being.  It’s an opportunity to peacefully transform your problems, your fears, and any pain and stress in your life into something more positive.  And, it's a great way to set or shift into the perfect mood for your day, feeling perfectly aligned with all that you desire.

 You don’t have to sit in silence for long periods of time to gain the multitude of emotional and physical benefits!

Come to this Free Introduction to Meditation Class to learn and experience how simple and delightful it can be.  You’ll learn:

  •  Some simple techniques you can do for yourself for any length of time that is comfortable for you.
  • How to easily get into a meditative state and create pleasurable feelings.
  • The difference between active and passive meditation.
  • What you can use meditation for.

 We will not be doing traditional silent meditations.  The class will consist of 2-3 guided meditations, with discussion and instruction in between.  All you have to do is let go and listen to the Ann’s voice as she leads you through the process, like listening to a good story.

The meditations will leave you totally relaxed with magnificent feelings of peace, love, happiness and hope- essentially feeling really, really good!

All are welcome.  Please share this with your e-mail lists and groups, your friends, and your family!  It's a wonderful evening - like going on a mini retreat!   Your guests can either rsvp through you, or e-mail me their name, e-mail and phone #  to AnnIde@NewPossibilitiesCoaching.com.   They’ll receive confirmation and a reminder.

“I have never meditated before. It has always been hard for me to get difficult thoughts out of my head.  Tonight I really relaxed and seemed to go into another world.  It was great.  Thanks!”  Susy C.

“Your meditation showed how easy it can be to focus – something I usually think of as an effort.  Thanks, it was very nice!”  John H.

*If you like, you can bring a mat, blanket, and pillow to fully relax lying down. Or you can use what's available there, too, of course. Please arrive around 7:05 to get settled, so we can start on time.

We have been registered to capacity, so either RSVP'ing thru this site, or registration is required.
If your plans change, please, please be considerate and change your RSVP so we will not be turning away people unnecessarily and we will not be printing handouts or setting up for more people than necessary, as we have done in the past.  We're aiming for all yes rsvp's to show up.  Thank you!

Hope to see you there!

Warm heart,

Ann

Class leader: Ann Ide, M.A., certified master practitioner in Neuro-linguistic Programming and Hypnotherapy, and certified NLP Life Coach.  Ann can coach you to move beyond struggles and mere survival, to new levels of harmony, happiness and success.  With her expert questioning, inner exploration processes and personal change interventions, you’ll become emotionally and spiritually aligned to more easily create the happiness you desire.

**This class is co-sponsored by Roots and Wings and New Possibilities Coaching as a free community service to their clients and the surrounding communities.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Wings studio on the first floor

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community
